Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. To make this deal even more enticing, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly. Should you choose to accept, I assure you that you will be making a wise investment. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
